channel.title: CVE Feed for Open Babel -- Open Babel
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Open Babel -- Open Babel

item.title: CVE-2022-37331|2024-08-01T15:16:29.270Z -- open%20babel -- open%20babel
item.description: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the Gaussian format orientation functionality of Open Babel 3.1.1 and master commit 530dbfa3. A specially crafted malformed file can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-41793|2024-08-01T15:13:17.542Z -- open%20babel -- open%20babel
item.description: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the CSR format title functionality of Open Babel 3.1.1 and master commit 530dbfa3. A specially crafted malformed file can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-43467|2024-08-01T15:15:51.913Z -- open%20babel -- open%20babel
item.description: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the PQS format coord_file functionality of Open Babel 3.1.1 and master commit 530dbfa3. A specially crafted malformed file can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-42885|2024-08-01T14:49:18.706Z -- open%20babel -- open%20babel
item.description: A use of uninitialized pointer vulnerability exists in the GRO format res functionality of Open Babel 3.1.1 and master commit 530dbfa3. A specially crafted malformed file can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-46280|2024-08-01T15:12:55.169Z -- open%20babel -- open%20babel
item.description: A use of uninitialized pointer vulnerability exists in the PQS format pFormat functionality of Open Babel 3.1.1 and master commit 530dbfa3. A specially crafted malformed file can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.
